prompt: Playful, cute vector illustration with rounded shapes and soft shadows, pastel palette (mint, coral, sky blue, sunny yellow) on off-white background. Big central illustration, minimal text. grade.summary: All rubric items are met: the three model blocks clearly increase in size and are labeled small/medium/large; the speed gauge points to higher speed near the smallest block area, visually implying larger size is slower; the title 'Size' is clearly visible in the top-left; and the overall design is playful, minimal, and matches the requested pastel, rounded vector style.
